    • Method Detail

      • backupDatabase

        public boolean backupDatabase(java.lang.String host,
                     java.lang.String port,
                     java.lang.String user,
                     java.lang.String password,
                     java.lang.String db,
                     java.lang.String backupfile,
                     java.lang.String mysqlDumpExePath)
        This method is used for backup the mysql database
        Parameters:
        host - - hostname - localhost/127.0.0.1
        port - - 3306
        user - - username
        password - - password
        db - - database name
        backupfile - - file path to backup from the current location ex/ "/backup/"
        mysqlDumpExePath - - file path to mysqldump.exe from the current location ex/ copy the mysqldump.exe from mysql bin in to backup folder and set the path as backup ex/ "/backup/mysqldump.exe"
        Returns:
        the status of the backup true/false
